title: luvamia Wide Leg Jeans for Women Trendy High Waist Straight Leg Baggy Jeans Stretchy Denim Pants Trouser Jeans
description: Front Seam Design: Timeless design, never goes out of fashion. The trendy jeans for women 2025 adds sophistication to any look.

The high waist wide leg pants for women follow the standard US sizes. Size X-Small fits size 0 - size 2, Size Small fits size 4 - size 6, size Medium fits size 8 - size 10, Size Large fits size 12 - size 14, Size X-Large fits size 16 - size 18, Size XX-Large fits size 20 - size 22.
